comments.body:
This was changed in comparison of previous PR https://github.com/DefinitelyTyped/DefinitelyTyped/pull/40028.

Previous code compiles without error, because `LevelDOWN` extends `AbstractLevelDOWN`, which extends `AbstractOptions`, where each key has `any` type https://github.com/DefinitelyTyped/DefinitelyTyped/blob/13e6949a025a03d92596652a2bbd64448ed71382/types/abstract-leveldown/index.d.ts#L8-L10
